svg.title: DP-18: Dynamic Planning Adaptive Workflow Engine
svg.desc: Intelligent, self-adapting planning workflow that automatically adjusts to changing project conditions, context updates, and team dynamics while learning from outcomes to improve future planning accuracy and optimize workflow management.
svg.text: DP-18: Dynamic Planning Adaptive Workflow Engine
Intelligent Adaptation ‚Ä¢ Machine Learning ‚Ä¢ Real-Time Optimization ‚Ä¢ Context Awareness ‚Ä¢ Predictive Planning

g.text: ‚úì Automated task batching reducing context switching by 34%
‚úì Smart dependency resolution increasing parallel work by 28%
‚ö° AI-suggested workflow pattern improving delivery speed by 19%
